archimate:Requirement.name: ensure that a Vulnerability management process is in place and operational to ensure that vulnerabilities are forwarded to relevant parties
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Vulnerability management process and as a Security Resources in TEMA I need to ensure that a Vulnerability management process is in place and operational to ensure that vulnerabilities are forwarded to relevant parties, investigated and escalated if needed, in order to ensure that mitigating actions are taken for any found vulnerabilities.
